summary: The 'Freeze Aid For Student Assaulters Act of 2025' aims to deny federal student financial aid (grants, loans, and work assistance) under Title IV of the Higher Education Act of 1965 to individuals convicted of assaulting a police officer or rioting. It mandates that any previously received grants be converted into unsubsidized Stafford Loans, subject to repayment with interest, and ineligible for forgiveness programs. The bill is sponsored by Mr. Pfluger and Mr. Edwards.
